extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebPage(java.lang.String url)
      Constructor for the WebPage Class that initialize URL and constructs an empty String for contents and empty ArrayLists for images, files, and pages

      • getPagesSize

        public int getPagesSize()
        Finds the size of the pages ArrayList.
        Returns:
        Integer representing how many web pages were linked from the web page.

      • setURL

        public void setURL(java.lang.String url)
        Setter method for the URL variable.
        Parameters:
        url - String that can be used as URL for a file.

      • crawl

        public void crawl()
        Creates a URL from the URL variable and then reads in the contents of the corresponding web page; concatenating it together as the String HTML and then passes that to WebPages content variable. Then it calls the methods getImages(), getFiles, and getWebPages() to parse the content and find the appropriate returns.

      • getImages

        public void getImages()
        Pattern matches the contents of a WebPage to find the HTML tags for images.

      • getFiles

        public void getFiles()
        Pattern matches the contents of a WebPage to find the URL for non web page file links.

      • getWebPages

        public void getWebPages()
        Pattern matches the contents of a WebPage to find the URL for links to other web pages.
